commit message:
fix edittext

Fixed the default name edittext. Now the enter key on the keyboard is a finish key and you can only write the name in a single line.

Added bonus and percentage textview

Added a bonus and two percentage textviews. They are shown on the 'next level' screen. The second percentage textview is only used in multiplayer mode to display to total percentage cleared.

changed highest percentage to float

Now the statistics menu shows the highest percentage as a float number ( xx.xx %).

changed highest percentage to float

Now the highest percentage will be shown like this : 'xx.xx%'.
Added bars finished check and game pause

Added percentage to won screen and small fixes

Added the percentage to the 'next level' screen and fixed redrawing the field, when the game is paused and the orientation changed.
